options.text: Scale-out Networking for Telco industry allows you to create multiple connectivity subscriptions and configure them with the requisite infrastructure for Telco workloads. Select the location for the deployment.
Scale-out Networking for Telco Industry allows you to create multiple connectivity hubs with requisite networking infrastructure.

elements.name: esHub
elements.label: Deploy networking topology
elements.defaultValue: Hub and spoke with Azure Firewall
elements.toolTip: Select the preferred network topology. If third-party NVA is a requirement, you must deploy this into the connectivity subscription post the deployment.

allowedValues.label: Hub and spoke with Azure Firewall
Hub and spoke with your own third-party NVA

elements.name: esAddressHubVWAN
elements.label: Address space (required for vWAN hub)
elements.toolTip: Provide address prefix in CIDR notation (e.g 10.100.0.0/23)

validations.message: Invalid CIDR range. The address prefix must be in the range [10,24].

elements.name: esAddressHubHS
elements.label: Address space (required for hub virtual network)
elements.toolTip: Provide address prefix in CIDR notation (e.g 10.100.0.0/16)

validations.message: Invalid CIDR range. The address prefix must be in the range [10,24].

elements.name: esNwLocation
elements.label: Region for the first networking hub
elements.toolTip: Select the target region for you connectivity deployment (requires you to provide a subscriptionId for connectivity)

elements.name: esDdoS
elements.label: Enable DDoS Protection Standard
elements.toolTip: If 'Yes' is selected when also adding a connectivity subscription, DDoS Protection Standard will be enabled.

elements.name: esPrivateDns
elements.label: Create Private DNS Zones for Azure PaaS services
elements.toolTip: If 'Yes' is selected when also adding a subscription for connectivity, ARM will create Private DNS Zones for Azure PaaS services
